By Rahu on Wednesday, August 18, 2010 - 12:55 pm:

It's not too bad. I beat it with my second monster. His most accurate attack is at close range, at other ranges he doesnt hit as hard or as often, but like any dragon, you'd prefer it if he didnt hit you at all.
